title: This wireless charger magnetically connects to your iPhone for automatic charging – only $34.97
content:
Macworld

Powering up your iPhone can be a hassle, especially during the holidays. Between all the events and spectacles, everybody wants a fully charged device to capture all those moments — and often, there just aren’t enough outlets, power cubes, and charging cables to go around.

Give the gift of easy eternal power-ups for your iPhone with the Speedy Mag wireless charger, now 70% off its regular price at just $34.97 with this limited time holiday offer.

With this charger, you never have to worry about outlets or cables or all those other charging accessories. Optimized for iPhone 12 and later models, the Speedy Mag charger attached magnetically to the back of your iPhone, delivering a steady stream of much-needed wireless power.

Just slip the charger into place, let it lock on, and this stylish charger immediately fast feeds power automatically to your energy-starved iPhone, all with no extra cables or adapters needed. Of course, this charger, available in black, white or sky blue varieties, also features built-in safeguards to protect your tech at all times from overcharging.

Regularly $119.95, the Speedy Mag wireless charger is just $34.97 right now on a deal that even includes free shipping. This discount lasts until December 17, but be sure to place your order by December 7 and you’re guaranteed for on-time holiday delivery.

 

Speedy Mag Wireless Charger for iPhone (Black) – $34.97

Power up for $34.97

Prices subject to change.
